product_name: SmartWool Hiking Ultra Light Socks - Kids'
long_description: The SmartWool Hiking Ultra Light Crew socks let kids keep their minds on the trail ahead and off what's in their boots. Merino wool from New Zealand's alps is a natural, renewable resource that provides thermo-neutral insulation for varying temperatures and activities. WOW (wool on wool) technology increases wool content in high impact areas, improving durability and overall comfort. High-density impact zones under heels and forefeet (where impact is greatest) protect against shock and abrasion. Mesh ventilation zones, an arch brace and ultralight cushioning ensure comfortable without bulkiness. Hiking Ultra Light Crew socks feature multi-ribbed cuffs and flat-knit toe seams. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The SmartWool Hiking Ultra Light Crew socks let kids keep their minds on the trail ahead and off what's in their boots.
